title: Cannabis Industry On the Path To Normalization With Chuck Smith, President/CEO, Dixie Brands
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Chuck Smith is the President and CEO for Dixie Brands, a multi-state operator and the parent company of the Dixie and Synergy brands. He joins Rudy Hernandez to discuss the importance of banking access, building a company culture and the responsibility of brands to the industry. We also cover why the cannabis industry is only in the first inning and why investors need to be in it for the long haul. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
